verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mahaa devundu parishuddudagu thanayuni Arpinchenu neepai makkuvato vandana marpinchumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Painunna vatine ventaaduchu Ihaloka sangatulu gamaninchaka Kristesutho neevu lepabadina vaadavai Painunna vaatine vedakuchu vandana marpinchumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}lokaana narabedhamu paatimpaka Paraloka devuni sevinchumu Kristesutho neevu lepabadina vaadavai Painunna vaatini vedakuchu vandana marpinchumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sangeetanaadamuto prabhu kristuku Halleluya stutularpinchumu Samastamaayana perata cheyuchu Krutajnathaa stutulu chellinchuchu vandanamarpinchumu{/lang-eng}
